location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to Lieut. W. Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Lieut. W. Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of several letters dated 3, 29, 30 December 1809 and 12 and 16 February 1810.
